name: LoneWolf (itch) (13SageL)
description:
Fly around the harsh terrain of the planet toxica in this modern railshooter, to defeat the invading gloobulons before they reach the planet's core. Earn points by destroying enemies and see if you can survive until the end. 

controls: WASD - up, left, down, right respectively. Left click to fire

This was the 4th "complete" game I've made and honestly it went way worse than i would've hoped and that was mainly because of unity which killed all motivation in me. This, the final release, was severely rushed at the end so that i could still add this year and a half's work to my portfolio. It has some admirable parts but all in all i wish the game had come out better. I do hope you enjoy it though! I still did, as whack as this railshooter is. Big thanks to Gamedev.tv for the lessons!
